title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From EC2 to EKS: Tipalti’s transformation to Windows containers on AWS (MAM339)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从 EC2 到 EKS：Tipalti 在 AWS 上向 Windows 容器的转型 (MAM339)
abstract: Is your Windows applications constrained by scaling limitations and complex operations? Discover how Tipalti transformed their traditional Windows application into a modern, containerized solution. Learn how to overcome process management challenges, implement auto-scaling, and achieve up to a 50% performance improvement. We'll walk through the implementation of Windows containers, logging solutions, and operational enhancements. Through Tipalti's transformation experience, key technical decisions, and lessons learned, you'll gain practical knowledge for modernizing your Windows applications.
abstract_cn: 您的Windows应用程序是否受到扩展限制和复杂操作的约束？了解Tipalti如何将其传统Windows应用程序转换为现代化容器化解决方案。学习如何克服进程管理挑战、实施自动扩展并实现高达50%的性能提升。我们将详细介绍Windows容器的实施、日志记录解决方案和运营增强功能。通过Tipalti的转型经验、关键技术决策和经验教训，您将获得现代化Windows应用程序的实用知识。
